markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plate Armor of the Deep](/Equipment.aspx?ID=157)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 558 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of _+2 greater resilient [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ is decorated with swirling, ornate motifs of waves and fish scales. While wearing it, you take no Speed reduction or check penalty from armor when Swimming, gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Swim, can breathe underwater, and can speak Aquan.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Plate Armor of the Deep
